name: pillsmultiplayer
description:
a game still in development but playable multiplayer through steam 

there are a lot of bugs and performance leaks needed to be fixed

picking up the trash which is somewhere on the map will bring you a  litle bit of money

you can get weapons through the white floating boxes

shop = B

"hidden" mod menu = ^

building = 1 , 2

WIP house building = F
